a.detail: Burning torches in iron sconces line the corridor
a.summary: Burning torches in iron sconces line the corridor

c.detail: A narrow shaft descends from the corridor into a midden chamber below
c.summary: A narrow shaft descends from the corridor into a midden chamber below

e.detail:
Guillotine Blade: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +6 to hit against one target, 4d10 slashing damage

i.detail: A metallic odor fills the corridor
i.summary: A metallic odor fills the corridor

m.detail: A rustling noise fills the corridor
m.summary: A rustling noise fills the corridor

n.detail: Several alcoves are cut into the walls here
n.summary: Several alcoves are cut into the walls here

r.detail: A fountain of water sits in an alcove here
r.summary: A fountain of water sits in an alcove here

u.detail:
Ice Spear Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    +8 to hit against one target, 4d10 cold damage

v.detail:
Magic Missle Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 20 to disable;
    one target, 2d10 force damage

w.detail: A narrow shaft falls into the corridor from above
w.summary: A narrow shaft falls into the corridor from above

details.history: The dungeon was created by a lawful evil paladin as a mine. It became cursed by the gods, and has lain empty for many centuries until recently.
details.illumination: Shadowy (phosphorescent fungus or candles every 20 ft.)

detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "Upon the Twilight of Shadows, when the Oath of Virtue is broken and the Golden Scepter is lost, the Bridge of Orbs shall be found" on the west wall, and a sulphurous odor fills the room

east.desc: Trapped and Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 25 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp) (slides up)
east.trap: One-way Door: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable

east.desc: Locked Iron Door (DC 15 to open, DC 30 to break; 60 hp)

north.desc: Locked Good Wooden Door (DC 20 to open, DC 15 to break; 15 hp) (slides up)

south.desc: Locked Strong Wooden Door (DC 10 to open, DC 20 to break; 20 hp)

west.desc: Secret (DC 15 to find) Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)
west.secret: The door is concealed behind a statue of a dread vampire, and opened by filling his chalice with blood

west.desc: Locked Stone Door (DC 10 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)

detail.room_features: A chute descends from the room into a midden chamber below, and a circle of tall stones stands in the center of the room

detail.room_features: A magical altar in the north side of the room heals all wounds of whomever sacrifices a magical item upon it (but only once), and a faded and torn tapestry hangs from the west wall

wandering_monsters.1: Cult Fanatic (cr 2, mm 345) and 1 x Thug (cr 1/2, mm 350); medium, 550 xp, hunting for food
wandering_monsters.2: Gelatinous Cube (cr 2, mm 242); medium, 450 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
wandering_monsters.3: 7 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); hard, 350 xp, hunting for food
wandering_monsters.4: Cult Fanatic (cr 2, mm 345) and 2 x Cultist (cr 1/8, mm 345); medium, 500 xp, actively patrolling their territory
wandering_monsters.5: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Ogre (cr 2, mm 237); medium, 550 xp, actively patrolling their territory
wandering_monsters.6: Orc War Chief (cr 4, mm 246) and 1 x Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246); deadly, 1200 xp, returning to their lair with plunder
